text: Valparaiso is a city in Indiana in the United States. == 1917 Time Capsule == In 2006, in the town hall of Valaparaiso, a time capsule from 1917 was found. Inside was a letter, written by Louis James Gast in 1917. There were also photos, a telephone book, and magazine pages. Category:Cities in Indiana Category:County seats in Indiana Category:Suburbs of Chicago
title: Valparaiso, Indiana
